body: Some bullshit ntr again, of the worst kind, with pretensions of realism, with some effort put into the story and characters. With female going on binge whoring like some forty something ex sailor goes on binge drinking, and always returning, always returning to her little emotional tampon when the life kicks her in the guts for the n-th time, and always with a smile and a warm gesture. Hypocrisy. That's what gets to me, makes my stomach turn. Fuck this shit, this should never be translated. Ugly bastard ntr? Be my guest. This shit? Burn it.
